com.joelhockey.jacknji11
Class Template

java.lang.Object
  com.sun.jna.PointerType
      com.joelhockey.jacknji11.Template
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.sun.jna.NativeMapped
public class Template
extends com.sun.jna.PointerType

Wrapper for CK_ATTRIBUTE[] (in this case it is CKA class that represents PKCS#11 CK_ATTRIBUTE struct). JNA direct memory mapping doesn't seem to support struct arrays, so this class is required to map the list of (type, pValue, ulValueLen) into a contiguous block of memory.

Author:
Joel Hockey (joel.hockey@gmail.com)

Method Detail

length

public com.sun.jna.NativeLong length()
Returns:
length of template (0 if templ is null)

update

public void update()
Reads (updated) JNA Memory and modifies values in list. This must be called after native PKCS#11 calls in Native that modify CK_ATTRIBUTE struct such as Native.C_GetAttributeValue(NativeLong, NativeLong, Template, NativeLong). This is automatically done by the C and CE interfaces.

dump

public void dump(java.lang.StringBuilder sb)
Dump for debug.
